item.title: Build and push docker images to ghcr.io with GitHub Actions
item.description: When you host your project code on GitHub and want to release it as a docker image for deployment or just publish it, the way to go are GitHub actions. Itâ€™s basically hooks that can start CI/DC workflows on repository events.
